div.div:
Skill receives a standardized request
with appropriate context
- Identity
- Raw text
- Domain
- *intent/*desired actions

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 205px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Example: What is my hsa amount?
1. Classifier: hsa maps to Financial Domain
2. AskOptum triggers registered skills for Financial Domain for tenant
3.Â Trigger skill:
{
Â identity: jtanner
Â domain: financial
Â raw_text: "what is my hsa amount?"
Â intents (not supported): [
Â Â "check_balance"
Â ]
}

switch.text: Example: What is my hsa amount?...

div.div:
Skill respond with a standardized
AskOptum response
- title (string)
- text (markdown, html, string)
- list of links
